quoteText:
Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default.
However, you can choose to set your browser to remove or reject browser cookies.
Each browser is a little different, so look at your browser's help menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies, or visit www.allaboutcookies.org.
Please note, however, that our Services may not function properly if your browser does not accept cookies.
title: Couchsurfing informs you about the fact that you can disable cookies

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
tosdr.tldr:
"Cookies 
Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. If you prefer, 
you can usually choose to set your browser to remove or reject browser 
cookies; however, our Services may not function properly if you do 
so."
